name: Therium-2 git
body:
# Therium-2 Github Release

This is Timbles here.
Therium-2 is a semi-non-linear level campaign for Wolfire's Overgrowth.
Unless you're testing out for a closed beta, I advise you not look at this stuff. Unless you're totally cool with **SPOILERS**.

Currently I'm not sure how many of the levels are finished but there's gonna be a lot when I'm done.

## How to test

When you load and install Therium-2 on your Overgrowth client, load _therium2-test.xml_
Report any bugs and errors that happen from doing that.
When you're ready to test the game, load the prologue by typing _therium2-prologue.xml_ and load the beginning by typing _therium2.xml_
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
